titles.title: A bill to repeal the funding authorization sunset and the total funding cap for the Essex National Heritage Area.
A bill to repeal the funding authorization sunset and the total funding cap for the Essex National Heritage Area.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 115-526.

bill.summary:
This bill permanently extends the authority of the Department of the Interior to make grants and provide other assistance for the Essex National Heritage Area in Massachusetts.
The bill also repeals the limitation on the total amount of funding that may be appropriated for the heritage area.
